channel.title: I Forgot How I Did It
channel.description: Recent content on I Forgot How I Did It

item.title: That Docker web server
item.description: I have a Digital Ocean droplet running a Docker Nginx web server, where I can serve different websites under different subdomains.

item.title: This Blog
item.description: I don’t know about you, but I have let so many little achievements of my past laid to waste, because I forgot how to reproduce them.
